00052 static inline float
00053 flatfield(float fg, float bg, float dc=0.0){
00054   if ( dc >= bg ) return 1.0;
00055   else if (dc >= fg ) return 0.0;
00056   else return (fg-dc)/(bg-dc);
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00066 static inline void
00067 flatfield(Map & result, const Map & fg, const Map & bg){
00068   if ( ! bg.size() ) {
00069     result = fg;
00070     return;
00071   }
00072   Shape sh=fg.shape();
00073   if( sh != bg.shape() )
00074     throw_error("flat field", "Different shapes of the input arrays.");
00075   int sz=0;
00076   for (int icur=0; icur<sh(0); icur++)
00077     for (int jcur=0; jcur<sh(1); jcur++)
00078       result(icur,jcur) = flatfield( fg(icur,jcur), bg(icur,jcur) );
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00089 static inline void
00090 flatfield(Map & result, const Map & fg, const Map & bg, const Map & dc){
00091   if ( ! dc.size() ) {
00092     flatfield(result, fg, bg);
00093     return;
00094   }
00095   Shape sh=fg.shape();
00096   if( sh != bg.shape() || sh != dc.shape() )
00097     throw_error("flat field", "Different shapes of the input arrays.");
00098   if( sh != result.shape() )
00099     result.resize(sh);
00100   int sz=0;
00101   for (int icur=0; icur<sh(0); icur++)
00102     for (int jcur=0; jcur<sh(1); jcur++)
00103       result(icur,jcur) = flatfield( fg(icur,jcur), bg(icur,jcur), dc(icur,jcur) );
00104 }

00117 static inline float
00118 cutone(float x){
00119   return x>1.0 ? 1.0 : x ;
00120 }
